page.title: 09TOURISM
page.content: People come to Huntly as it is a central place to stay.Then travel to many surrounding places-:such as castles,fishing areas,big houses and the countryside.An example is Huntly Castle-:building was finished in 1602 when the first Marquess of Huntly returned from exile.The average age of tourists to Huntly is 40-45.The people stay for a week to ten days,and usually stay in bed and breakfast accommodation.Tourists come here for the peace and quiet,interesting places and the coast.Tourist come here for peace and quiet,intersting places and because it is between the highlands and the coast. Tourists usually come by car or on coach tours. There is a tourist information centerin Huntly square where you can get leaflets on forest wakls in the surrounding area.
